title: Natasha, the Infiltrator
body:
Primary: Marksmen. Secondary: Assassin. Additional Roles: Player Choice. 
Statistics: Attack Power: 9. Defense Power: 3. Ability Power: 3. Difficulty: 7.
	
Health: 356(+36). Health Regen.: 2.0(+0.43)
Mana: 0(+0). Mana Regen.: 0(+0)
Range: 500(Range). Attack Damage: 59(+3.2)
Armor: 13(+1.9). Magic Res.: 30(+0)
Attack Speed: 0.630(+2.0%). Move. Speed: 345.

Appearance: Natasha is a 5’ft tall Caucasian woman with short dark brown hair with her banes covering left eye, her eye coloration is light maple brown. She wears a thick short-cut brown coat that is unzipped, a black shirt that has tear on her stomach section showing a large scar on her torso, she also wears black pants with boots that have metal plating around the soles. Her equipment that she uses is an infer-red visor, a proto-type gadget & an experimental rifle from Piltover that has been modified by a Zaun scientist associate of hers.

***Passive: Body Count.***
Every time Natasha gains a Kill on an enemy Champion she will gain a Body Count on that killed enemy Champion. Body Count is a Buff that allows Natasha to learn from her fights with the target & aim more precise shots at the target dealing 3% of the targets Max HP as True Damage with each Basic Attack for 35 seconds.

***Q-Ability: Augment Assault/Augment Stalker.*** 
Range: Self-Cast. 
Cool Down: 2.
Bonus Physical Damage: 5%/6%/7%/8%/9%. 
Critical Damage Hit: 10%/15%/20%/25%/30%.
**Activate**: upon this Abilities activation Natasha will switch the mode of the proto-type rifle she carries around:
***Augment Assault***: when Natasha has this mode active her rifle will have 15% increased Attack Speed while also having Basic Attacks deal a percentage of her current Attack Damage as bonus Physical Damage.
***Augment Stalker***: when Natasha has this mode active her rifle will have 100-range increase to her Attack Range while also having her Basic Attacks have a percentage chance to deal Critical Damage.

***W-Ability: Red Visor.*** 
Range: Self-Cast. 
Cool Down: 17/16/15/14/13.
**Activate:** when Natasha has activated this Ability she will activate her visor which will give her True Sight within a 400-radius of herself for 10 seconds, while her visor is active all enemy Champions with the area will be outlined in a bright red outline. While an enemy Champion is out lined Natasha gains 12% Life Steal for the duration of the Ability.

***E-Ability: Grappling Hook.*** 
Range: 450. 
Cool Down: 13.
Physical Damage: 35/55/75/95/115(+50% bonus AD).
**Activate: **after Natasha has chosen a narrow path with this Ability then upon its activation she will pull out a grapple-hook gun from her coat then fires the hook in the chosen direction, if the hook comes in contact with an allied Champion, Tower or Terrain the gun will then pull Natasha to the hooked object. If the hook comes in contact with an enemy Champion the hook will deal Physical Damage & then Natasha will slam her gun into the ground anchoring the enemy Champion to be unable to move further then the hooks cable range for 1.5 seconds.

***R-Ability: Kinetic Bubble/Death Hound.***
Range: Self-Cast/1200. 
Cool Down: 148/125/107.
Damage Reflection: 10%/15%/20%. 
Physical Damage: 315/415/515(+50% bonus AD).
**Activate**: depending on which mode Natasha has her rifle in determines on what her Ultimate’s effect is:
***Kinetic Bubble***: if Natasha has her rifle on its Augment Assault mode & then Natasha activates this Ability she will use a special gadget strapped to her wrist, after the initial activation Natasha will create a shield around herself for 6 seconds. For the 6 second duration any damage that Natasha takes will be reduced by 15% & will have a percentage of the original damage be reflected back at the damage source as Physical Damage.
***Death Hound***: if Natasha has her rifle on its Augment Stalker mode before she uses this Ability then Natasha can select a narrow path with this Ability then upon its activation she will fire a special round that releases a fiery dog phantom in the chosen direction, if the dog comes in contact with any enemy Champions then they will be dealt Physical Damage. While the dog is running it leaves behind a trail of smoke that will increase Natasha's Movement Speed by 35% while she remains inside the path.

replies.body: please leave a comment or review down bellow.
I'll have to look at that one another time, I've got some other stuff to catch up on before it gets too much later.

> Activate: when Natasha has activated this Ability she will activate her visor which will give her True Sight within a 400-radius of her for 10 seconds, while her visor is active all enemy Champions with the area will be outlined in a bright red outline.

If the hook comes in contact with an enemy Champion the hook will deal Physical Damage & then Natasha will slam her gun into the ground anchoring the enemy Champion to be unable to move further then the hooks cable range for 1.5 seconds.
> 
> R-Ability: Kinetic Bubble/Death Hound. Range: Self-Cast/1200. Cool Down: 148/125/107.
> Damage Reflection: 10%/15%/20%. Physical Damage: 315/415/515(+50% bonus AD).
> **Activate**: depending on which mode Natasha has her rifle in determines on what her Ultimate’s effect is:
> ***Kinetic Bubble***: if Natasha has her rifle on its Augment Assault mode & then Natasha activates this Ability she will use a special gadget strapped to her wrist, after the initial activation Natasha will create a shield around herself for 6 seconds. For the 6 second duration any damage that Natasha takes will be reduced by 15% & will have a percentage of the original damage be reflected back at the damage source as Physical Damage.
> ***Death Hound***: if Natasha has her rifle on its Augment Stalker mode before she uses this Ability then Natasha can select a broad path with this Ability then upon its activation she will fire a special round that releases a fiery dog phantom in the chosen direction, if the dog comes in contact with any enemy Champions then they will be dealt Physical Damage & have their Movement Speed by lowered by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

Really neat concept, as usual!  My notes:

The passive is a really neat idea (perma debuff on enemies) and one that I have been tinkering with myself.  I think you're on the right track but dealing that much bonus damage (true damage, no less) per auto is really, really strong.  If she gets a single kill at bot lane, it's pretty much GG, which then snowballs  into a 2nd and 3rd kill.  This is difficult to balance around, so I have an alternative idea (though it removes the coolest part of the ability as you have it).  What if she got "body count" applied to HER whenever she got a kill?  And the buff lasts 60 seconds or so.  It promotes short sequences of action and even some drawn out team fights, but still disappears when there's a lull in the action.  Could make it last 30 seconds on assists, as well.

Q- Very Jinx'esque but I still like it.

W- Seems like a cool effect, but also seems a bit underpowered.  Other champions with vision abilities like this have other passive components attached to it; something you might want to consider.

E- Really neat!  I'm not sure if it makes sense to work on allied champions, though.

R- Very cool duality going on here.  My only concern is that Ults are usually needed in the most clutch of moments and times, and tying it to her 5 second cooldown stance dance will lead to a bad user experience of wanting one ult but being in the other ult's form for too long.  This can be fixed by drastically shortening the toggle time between her gun modes, perhaps at the expense of some power (namely the range and some of the bonus crit).

ALSO, I like the idea of one ability being the defensive option and the other being the aggressive.  However, I feel in its current form, the dog is also a defensive option as it can be used to slow and kite divers.  To solidify the attack dog as an aggressive move, instead of him slowing your enemies, what if Natasha got a speed INCREASE when she runs in the direction of her dog?  And the dog has really fast movement speed and tracks down enemy champions and nips at 'em for ~10 seconds.  That way Natasha can chase down the fleeing target because you sicced the dogs on them- literally!

thank you for your review you are the best reviewer i have EVER had! i made the Changes to the Abilities you said could use, as for the E since she is a back line right-click (an a spy or thief or whatever job she takes) the E is meant to use anything or anyone to get yourself out of a bad position. like if you have a low-health Support backing away from a fight you can use your E to get away if a wall or Tower is not the best spot to E towards.

i got another old concept i would like you to look at if you want?

Jess, the Gunslinger
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/xm1Knc5E-jess-the-gunslinger

I think the q ability is a little bit to op especially the 720 range benefit that even beats Caitlyn. But I think its interesting to have an ADC with no cost, just alter some stuff to make her less op and when give her life via lore,background, and/or sayings. Btw if you can , check out my concept : [Minx](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/1gNJlt6Q-champion-concept-natasha-fantasia-esperanza-minx-the-living-virus?page=1)
wow now that is a well thought out Concept i bow my head in defeat to your better layout, sorry if it took me so long i was busy in getting ready for my best friends wedding & work.
u don't think i tried to much or did to little? i wanted to make her a right click monster with some tricks up her sleeves.
